.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkBindImageMemoryDeviceGroupInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_BIND_IMAGE_MEMORY_DEVICE_GROUP_INFO
* [[VUID-VkBindImageMemoryDeviceGroupInfo-pDeviceIndices-parameter]] If pname:deviceIndexCount is not `0`, pname:pDeviceIndices must: be a valid pointer to an array of pname:deviceIndexCount basetype:uint32_t values
* [[VUID-VkBindImageMemoryDeviceGroupInfo-pSplitInstanceBindRegions-parameter]] If pname:splitInstanceBindRegionCount is not `0`, pname:pSplitInstanceBindRegions must: be a valid pointer to an array of pname:splitInstanceBindRegionCount sname:VkRect2D structures
****
